reactions.description: Reaction of sodium sulfate with barium chloride to produce barium sulfate and sodium chloride.

reactions.name: Butene Combustion with Nitrogen
reactions.description: Combustion of butene in oxygen and nitrogen to produce carbon dioxide, water, and nitrogen.

reactions.name: Sodium Bicarbonate and Acetic Acid Reaction
reactions.description: Reaction of sodium bicarbonate with acetic acid to produce sodium acetate, carbon dioxide, and water.

reactions.name: Aluminum and Bromine Reaction
reactions.description: Reaction of aluminum with bromine to produce aluminum bromide.

reactions.name: Hydrogen, Chlorine, and Oxygen Reaction
reactions.description: Reaction of hydrogen with chlorine and oxygen to produce hydrochloric acid and water.

reactions.name: Ammonia Oxidation
reactions.description: Oxidation of ammonia with oxygen to produce nitrogen monoxide and water.

reactions.name: Acetylene and Chlorine Reaction
reactions.description: Reaction of acetylene with chlorine and water to produce 1,2-dichloroethane and hydrochloric acid.

reactions.name: Hydrogen Sulfide Oxidation
reactions.description: Oxidation of hydrogen sulfide with oxygen to produce sulfur dioxide and water.

reactions.name: Calcium Hydroxide and Carbon Dioxide Reaction
reactions.description: Reaction of calcium hydroxide with carbon dioxide to produce calcium carbonate and water.

reactions.name: Hydrogen Peroxide and Potassium Iodide Reaction
reactions.description: Reaction of hydrogen peroxide with potassium iodide to produce iodine, potassium hydroxide, and water.

reactions.name: Lactic Acid Combustion
reactions.description: Combustion of lactic acid in oxygen to produce carbon dioxide and water.

reactions.name: Silicon Dioxide and Hydrofluoric Acid Reaction
reactions.description: Reaction of silicon dioxide with hydrofluoric acid to produce hexafluorosilicic acid and water.

reactions.name: Sodium Chloride and Sulfuric Acid Reaction with Manganese Dioxide
reactions.description: Reaction of sodium chloride with sulfuric acid and manganese dioxide to produce chlorine gas, sodium sulfate, manganese sulfate, and water.

reactions.name: Ethanol Combustion
reactions.description: Combustion of ethanol in oxygen to produce carbon dioxide and water.

reactions.name: Potassium Dichromate and Sulfuric Acid Reaction
reactions.description: Reaction of potassium dichromate with sulfuric acid and water to produce chromium(III) oxide, potassium sulfate, and oxygen.

reactions.name: Calcium Carbide and Nitrogen Reaction
reactions.description: Reaction of calcium carbide with nitrogen to produce calcium cyanamide and carbon.

reactions.name: Iron(II) Sulfide and Oxygen Reaction
reactions.description: Reaction of iron(II) sulfide with oxygen to produce iron(III) oxide and sulfur dioxide.

reactions.name: Methanol Combustion
reactions.description: Combustion of methanol in oxygen to produce carbon dioxide and water.

reactions.name: Lead(II) Nitrate and Potassium Iodide Reaction
reactions.description: Reaction of lead(II) nitrate with potassium iodide to produce lead(II) iodide and potassium nitrate.

reactions.name: Aluminum and Iron(III) Oxide Reaction
reactions.description: Reaction of aluminum with iron(III) oxide to produce aluminum oxide and iron.

reactions.name: Ethane Combustion
reactions.description: Combustion of ethane in oxygen to produce carbon dioxide and water.

reactions.name: Calcium Carbonate Reaction with Water and Carbon Dioxide
reactions.description: Reaction of calcium carbonate with water and carbon dioxide to produce calcium bicarbonate.

reactions.name: Ammonium Nitrate and Sulfuric Acid Reaction
reactions.description: Reaction of ammonium nitrate with sulfuric acid to produce ammonium bisulfate and nitric acid.

reactions.name: Iron(II) Sulfide and Hydrochloric Acid Reaction
reactions.description: Reaction of iron(II) sulfide with hydrochloric acid to produce iron(II) chloride and hydrogen sulfide.

reactions.name: White Phosphorus and Oxygen Reaction
reactions.description: Reaction of white phosphorus with oxygen to produce diphosphorus pentoxide.

reactions.name: Ammonia and Hydrochloric Acid Reaction
reactions.description: Reaction of ammonia with hydrochloric acid to produce ammonium chloride.

reactions.name: Barium Chloride and Sodium Sulfate Reaction
reactions.description: Reaction of barium chloride with sodium sulfate to produce barium sulfate and sodium chloride.

reactions.name: Magnesium and Nitrogen Reaction
reactions.description: Reaction of magnesium with nitrogen to produce magnesium nitride.

reactions.name: Calcium Hydroxide and Chlorine Reaction
reactions.description: Reaction of calcium hydroxide with chlorine to produce calcium oxychloride, calcium chloride, and water.

reactions.name: Ethyl Chloride and Sodium Hydroxide Reaction
reactions.description: Reaction of ethyl chloride with sodium hydroxide to produce ethanol and sodium chloride.

reactions.name: Copper and Sulfuric Acid Reaction
reactions.description: Reaction of copper with sulfuric acid to produce copper(II) sulfate, sulfur dioxide, and water.
